mapper.insert:
insert into tb_terminal
f_no,
f_lastOnlineState,
f_lastSignal,
f_lastOnlineTime,
f_longitude,
f_latitude,
f_adminDivNo,
f_address,
f_visible,
f_alarmPhone,
f_name,

insert into tb_terminal (f_no, f_lastOnlineState, f_lastSignal, f_lastOnlineTime, f_longitude, f_latitude, f_adminDivNo, f_address, f_visible, f_alarmPhone, f_name) values
(
null,
'${item.get("no")}',
null,
${item.get("lastOnlineState")},
null,
${item.get("lastSignal")},
null,
'${item.get("lastOnlineTime")}',
null,
${item.get("longitude")},
null,
${item.get("latitude")},
null,
'${item.get("adminDivNo")}',
null,
'${item.get("address")}',
null,
${item.get("visible")},
null,
'${item.get("alarmPhone")}',
null
'${item.get("name")}'
)
mapper.delete:
delete from tb_terminal
and f_no = '${params.get("no")}' and f_no is null
and f_no in('${item}')
and f_no >= '${params.minNo}' and f_no < '${params.maxNo}' and f_no like '%${params.subNo}%' and f_no like '%${params.startsWithNo}' and f_no like '${params.endsWithNo}%'
and f_lastOnlineState = ${params.get("lastOnlineState")} and f_lastOnlineState is null
and f_lastOnlineState in(${item})
and f_lastOnlineState >= ${params.minLastOnlineState} and f_lastOnlineState < ${params.maxLastOnlineState}
and f_lastSignal = ${params.get("lastSignal")} and f_lastSignal is null
and f_lastSignal in(${item})
and f_lastSignal >= ${params.minLastSignal} and f_lastSignal < ${params.maxLastSignal}
and f_lastOnlineTime = '${params.get("lastOnlineTime")}' and f_lastOnlineTime is null
and f_lastOnlineTime in('${item}')
and f_lastOnlineTime >= '${params.minLastOnlineTime}' and f_lastOnlineTime < '${params.maxLastOnlineTime}'
and f_longitude = ${params.get("longitude")} and f_longitude is null
and f_longitude in(${item})
and f_longitude >= ${params.minLongitude} and f_longitude < ${params.maxLongitude}
and f_latitude = ${params.get("latitude")} and f_latitude is null
and f_latitude in(${item})
and f_latitude >= ${params.minLatitude} and f_latitude < ${params.maxLatitude}
and f_adminDivNo = '${params.get("adminDivNo")}' and f_adminDivNo is null
and f_adminDivNo in('${item}')
and f_adminDivNo >= '${params.minAdminDivNo}' and f_adminDivNo < '${params.maxAdminDivNo}' and f_adminDivNo like '%${params.subAdminDivNo}%' and f_adminDivNo like '%${params.startsWithAdminDivNo}' and f_adminDivNo like '${params.endsWithAdminDivNo}%'
and f_address = '${params.get("address")}' and f_address is null
and f_address in('${item}')
and f_address >= '${params.minAddress}' and f_address < '${params.maxAddress}' and f_address like '%${params.subAddress}%' and f_address like '%${params.startsWithAddress}' and f_address like '${params.endsWithAddress}%'
and f_visible = ${params.get("visible")} and f_visible is null
and f_visible in(${item})
and f_visible >= ${params.minVisible} and f_visible < ${params.maxVisible}
and f_alarmPhone = '${params.get("alarmPhone")}' and f_alarmPhone is null
and f_alarmPhone in('${item}')
and f_alarmPhone >= '${params.minAlarmPhone}' and f_alarmPhone < '${params.maxAlarmPhone}' and f_alarmPhone like '%${params.subAlarmPhone}%' and f_alarmPhone like '%${params.startsWithAlarmPhone}' and f_alarmPhone like '${params.endsWithAlarmPhone}%'
and f_name = '${params.get("name")}' and f_name is null
and f_name in('${item}')
and f_name >= '${params.minName}' and f_name < '${params.maxName}' and f_name like '%${params.subName}%' and f_name like '%${params.startsWithName}' and f_name like '${params.endsWithName}%'
mapper.update:
update tb_terminal
f_no = #{obj.no}, f_no = null,
f_lastOnlineState = #{obj.lastOnlineState}, f_lastOnlineState = null,
f_lastSignal = #{obj.lastSignal}, f_lastSignal = null,
f_lastOnlineTime = #{obj.lastOnlineTime}, f_lastOnlineTime = null,
f_longitude = #{obj.longitude}, f_longitude = null,
f_latitude = #{obj.latitude}, f_latitude = null,
f_adminDivNo = #{obj.adminDivNo}, f_adminDivNo = null,
f_address = #{obj.address}, f_address = null,
f_visible = #{obj.visible}, f_visible = null,
f_alarmPhone = #{obj.alarmPhone}, f_alarmPhone = null,
f_name = #{obj.name}, f_name = null,
and f_no = '${tag.get("no")}' and f_no is null

and f_no >= '${tag.minNo}' and f_no < '${tag.maxNo}' and f_no like '%${tag.subNo}%' and f_no like '%${tag.startsWithNo}' and f_no like '${tag.endsWithNo}%'

and f_lastOnlineState >= ${tag.minLastOnlineState} and f_lastOnlineState < ${tag.maxLastOnlineState}
and f_lastSignal = ${tag.get("lastSignal")} and f_lastSignal is null
and f_lastSignal in(${item})
and f_lastSignal >= ${tag.minLastSignal} and f_lastSignal < ${tag.maxLastSignal}
and f_lastOnlineTime = '${tag.get("lastOnlineTime")}' and f_lastOnlineTime is null
and f_lastOnlineTime in('${item}')
and f_lastOnlineTime >= '${tag.minLastOnlineTime}' and f_lastOnlineTime < '${tag.maxLastOnlineTime}'
and f_longitude = ${tag.get("longitude")} and f_longitude is null
and f_longitude in(${item})
and f_longitude >= ${tag.minLongitude} and f_longitude < ${tag.maxLongitude}
and f_latitude = ${tag.get("latitude")} and f_latitude is null
and f_latitude in(${item})
and f_latitude >= ${tag.minLatitude} and f_latitude < ${tag.maxLatitude}
and f_adminDivNo = '${tag.get("adminDivNo")}' and f_adminDivNo is null
and f_adminDivNo in('${item}')
and f_adminDivNo >= '${tag.minAdminDivNo}' and f_adminDivNo < '${tag.maxAdminDivNo}' and f_adminDivNo like '%${tag.subAdminDivNo}%' and f_adminDivNo like '%${tag.startsWithAdminDivNo}' and f_adminDivNo like '${tag.endsWithAdminDivNo}%'
and f_address = '${tag.get("address")}' and f_address is null
and f_address in('${item}')
and f_address >= '${tag.minAddress}' and f_address < '${tag.maxAddress}' and f_address like '%${tag.subAddress}%' and f_address like '%${tag.startsWithAddress}' and f_address like '${tag.endsWithAddress}%'
and f_visible = ${tag.get("visible")} and f_visible is null

mapper.select:
select f_no as 'no', f_lastOnlineState as 'lastOnlineState', f_lastSignal as 'lastSignal', f_lastOnlineTime as 'lastOnlineTime', f_longitude as 'longitude', f_latitude as 'latitude', f_adminDivNo as 'adminDivNo', f_address as 'address', f_visible as 'visible', f_alarmPhone as 'alarmPhone', f_name as 'name' from tb_terminal
and f_no = '${params.get("no")}' and f_no is null
and f_no in('${item}')
and f_no >= '${params.minNo}' and f_no < '${params.maxNo}' and f_no like '%${params.subNo}%' and f_no like '%${params.startsWithNo}' and f_no like '${params.endsWithNo}%'
and f_lastOnlineState = ${params.get("lastOnlineState")} and f_lastOnlineState is null
and f_lastOnlineState in(${item})
and f_lastOnlineState >= ${params.minLastOnlineState} and f_lastOnlineState < ${params.maxLastOnlineState}
and f_lastSignal = ${params.get("lastSignal")} and f_lastSignal is null
and f_lastSignal in(${item})
and f_lastSignal >= ${params.minLastSignal} and f_lastSignal < ${params.maxLastSignal}
and f_lastOnlineTime = '${params.get("lastOnlineTime")}' and f_lastOnlineTime is null
and f_lastOnlineTime in('${item}')
and f_lastOnlineTime >= '${params.minLastOnlineTime}' and f_lastOnlineTime < '${params.maxLastOnlineTime}'
and f_longitude = ${params.get("longitude")} and f_longitude is null
and f_longitude in(${item})
and f_longitude >= ${params.minLongitude} and f_longitude < ${params.maxLongitude}
and f_latitude = ${params.get("latitude")} and f_latitude is null
and f_latitude in(${item})
and f_latitude >= ${params.minLatitude} and f_latitude < ${params.maxLatitude}
and f_adminDivNo = '${params.get("adminDivNo")}' and f_adminDivNo is null
and f_adminDivNo in('${item}')
and f_adminDivNo >= '${params.minAdminDivNo}' and f_adminDivNo < '${params.maxAdminDivNo}' and f_adminDivNo like '%${params.subAdminDivNo}%' and f_adminDivNo like '%${params.startsWithAdminDivNo}' and f_adminDivNo like '${params.endsWithAdminDivNo}%'
and f_address = '${params.get("address")}' and f_address is null
and f_address in('${item}')
and f_address >= '${params.minAddress}' and f_address < '${params.maxAddress}' and f_address like '%${params.subAddress}%' and f_address like '%${params.startsWithAddress}' and f_address like '${params.endsWithAddress}%'
and f_visible = ${params.get("visible")} and f_visible is null
and f_visible in(${item})
and f_visible >= ${params.minVisible} and f_visible < ${params.maxVisible}
and f_alarmPhone = '${params.get("alarmPhone")}' and f_alarmPhone is null
and f_alarmPhone in('${item}')
and f_alarmPhone >= '${params.minAlarmPhone}' and f_alarmPhone < '${params.maxAlarmPhone}' and f_alarmPhone like '%${params.subAlarmPhone}%' and f_alarmPhone like '%${params.startsWithAlarmPhone}' and f_alarmPhone like '${params.endsWithAlarmPhone}%'
and f_name = '${params.get("name")}' and f_name is null
and f_name in('${item}')
and f_name >= '${params.minName}' and f_name < '${params.maxName}' and f_name like '%${params.subName}%' and f_name like '%${params.startsWithName}' and f_name like '${params.endsWithName}%'
order by
${item.name} desc
limit 0, 1

select count(f_no) from tb_terminal

and f_latitude = ${params.get("latitude")} and f_latitude is null

and f_address = '${params.get("address")}' and f_address is null

and f_address >= '${params.minAddress}' and f_address < '${params.maxAddress}' and f_address like '%${params.subAddress}%' and f_address like '%${params.startsWithAddress}' and f_address like '${params.endsWithAddress}%'

and f_name = '${params.get("name")}' and f_name is null
